title: Soul Lifter
description: Sean Strong, a Hull journalist struggling to come to terms with the rape and suicide of his sister, must cover the sexual assault and murder of a woman in the city. The story leads him to more bloodshed and an enigmatic misfit who is convinced that the police are withholding crucial evidence from the public. The more of the manâ€™s haunted past Strong learns, the more mysterious the explanations for the deaths become. Desperate to uncover the truth, he becomes embroiled in a race to stop a sadistic killer in possession of a unique power to trap his victims. With events locked on a course that causes Strong to question his sanity, and suspect the material existence of the human soul, somebody will decide that the only way to halt the murderous rampage is to unleash another monster...
author: Martin  Murphy
